name: Snorter
description: Snorter Bot is a Telegram-native trading bot designed to simplify and accelerate on-chain trading. It allows users to execute swaps, limit orders, snipes, and copy trades directly within Telegram, removing the need for external wallets or browser extensions. Built for performance and security, Snorter delivers low-fee, MEV-protected trades with built-in scam detection. The $SNORT token powers the ecosystem, providing holders with access to premium bot features, staking rewards, and governance rights.
